Не пришло подтверждение? Отправить повторно.

Если у вас нет учетной записи, то вам необходимо зарегистрироваться.

Data Protection Guidelines

Ledbiocoin team (hereinafter the Team) takes seriously your information security issues on our website www.ledbiocoin.com (hereinafter-the Site) and carries all licenses to in the field of protection and encryption of confidential information. This policy is intended to explain what information we collect and treat as confidential, how we process, store and protect it.

What information do we collect

The scope and content of the information collected is determined by the purpose of its processing. In addition to providing the Site services to our users, we may process collected information for statistical purposes, to improve the quality of our Site services and to diagnose our information systems. We also collect information from users essential for the Site and its services operation. This information may include (without limitation) registration data, that is any information unique to you, such as: title, user name, login password and email address, e-wallet address, mailing address, date and time of visit, pages viewed, your IP address, time spent on our Website; data on computer or mobile device which you use to access our Website, including model; operating system, browser version, and other device identifiers, as well as other personal data that you provide. By providing us with your personal information, you also consent to the collection, storage, use and disclosure of your personal information in accordance with this privacy policy. In addition to the above information, if you choose to communicate further with us by e-mail, it is possible to retain, use and disclose the content of your message along with your e-mail address and our responses. We do not verify the accuracy of this information, except for the financial information necessary to pay for services provided by the site. We may collect data on the devices which the user employs to connects to our servers. It is necessary to adapt web pages to various screen resolutions, input of information and Website navigation methods, etc. We may also collect technical information concerning the network addresses of users, browser versions and plug-ins. We need this information for statistics and to improve the compatibility of our products with different browsers.

How do we use this information

We do not share this information with third parties. All information we collect is used to provide you with the requested services and to fulfill our obligations. We may use your contacts to notify you of any changes related to the operation of the services of the Site, changes to the services provided by the Site or remind of the payment due in respect of subscription expiry; to inform you of our new services and special offers; to save, transfer or improve our Site; analyze and track data to determine the usefulness or popularity of any information and to understand better the online activity of users of our site; to comply with legal rules and regulations; to respond your requests or reply to your messages; to send you technical notices, support or administrative notices; identify, investigate, and prevent fraudulent transactions or unauthorized or illegal activities.

Data Protection System

Our Team provides a full range of information security services. We have all necessary human and material resources to carry provide information security and carry out audit of information systems security. Physical security of our servers is provided by 24 hr security and access control system to the server room. The list of persons entitled to access the server room is limited. To ensure protection against unauthorized access we employ appropriate means of information security and continuous updating of system and application software. We carry out audit of users' and administrators' activities. Security of communication channels between our servers and the user of the system is ensured by encryption with a private key based on the HTTPS Protocol. At the same time, the user identifies our servers by a trusted certificate. Users' personal data is encrypted with MD5. However, the measures we take cannot ensure the required level of confidentiality without adequate measures on the part of the users. The client computer should be equipped with modern anti-virus and up-to-date signature databases, have the latest browser and plug-ins, and use a modern operating system. The user of the Website services must have at least a basic understanding of computer security and comply with the requirements of computer hygiene.

Data Protection Procedures

We take reasonable measures to protect information transmitted through our website. However, no computer security system is completely error-free, and Internet is not a secure way to transmit information. As a result, we are not responsible or liable for any data that you send or receive from us over the Internet or for any unauthorized access to or use of that information, and we cannot and do not guarantee that the information transmitted by you or sent by us will not be received or changed before or after its transmission. by this you agree to grant an absolute discharge to our past, present, and future employees, officers, Directors, contractors, consultants, shareholders, suppliers, sellers, service providers, parent companies, subsidiaries, affiliates, agents, representatives, predecessors, successors and assigns of any loss or damage of any sort incurred as the result of any misappropriation, interception, change, deletion, destruction or use of information presented on our Website. Most web browsers accept cookies by default. If you wish to disable cookies please refer to the help menu of your browser. However, disabling cookies may limit the use of our web-site. You may also opt out of receiving promotional messages from us at any time by following the instructions in these messages. If you opt out, we will not be able to send you non-advertising messages, such as technical notices, support or administrative notices or information concerning your account (if you have one).

Application

This policy applies to our site, its services, software, equipment and personnel of our team. Ledbiocoin is not intended for users under the age of 18 and will not knowingly collect personal information from users under the age of 18. We require all Ledbiocoin users to be at least 18 years of age (or the age of majority in your jurisdiction), or have parental consent and supervision while using the service.

Changes to the privacy policy

The Team has the right at any time at its sole discretion to make any changes to this policy to comply with changes in the legislation, business practices, or the occurrence of other circumstances essential for Ledboicoin Team, resulting in the need to make appropriate changes. Changes to this privacy policy will become effective and binding on the Team and users of the Site from the time such changes are posted on our site. It is the user's responsibility to visit our site periodically to review any changes that may be made to this policy. Your continued use of our Website indicates Your agreement to be bound by any such changes to this policy. If you do not agree to this policy, you may not use our site and you have the full right not to use our site.

Links and third-party sites

Our Site may contain links to other third-party websites that may collect your personal information including through the use of cookies and other technologies. If you give a link to another site, you leave this Site and this policy does not apply to any activity on other sites. You should consult the policies of these websites as we do not control them and are not responsible for any information that is submitted or collected by third parties.

Contacts

If you have any questions related to the confidentiality of information on our Website www.ledbiocoin.com you can contact us by e-mail address support@ledbiocoin.com.
